email.subject: SCHIER 2025: Apply Now for Europe’s Only Summer School on Informatics Education Research

event_details.title: 2025 Summer School on Informatics Education Research (SCHIER)
event_details.description: the only summer school in Europe exclusively focused on research in Informatics Education
target_audience: researchers with an interest in Informatics Education Research
activities: Expert-led lectures and interactive sessions on key topics and methodologies.
Collaborative discussions on emerging research challenges.
Networking opportunities that foster meaningful, long-term collaboration and advancement.
event_details.closing_statement: Don’t miss this unique opportunity to engage with a vibrant community of researchers shaping the future of Informatics Education in Europe!

body.remark: Informatics Education is a growing and vital field recognised by the EU Council.
